Filigree.Name: Frozen Wanderer: Intelligence
Filigree.Description: +1 Intelligence Rare: +2 PRR Set Bonus: 2 Pieces: +5% Cold Spell Crit 3 Pieces: +10 Magical Resistance Rating Cap 4 Pieces: Cold Mastery: Gain 50 Cold Spellpower. Melee and Ranged attacks get 4d6+1d6 per epic character level in Cold damage. This effect will not stack with other Sentient weapon procs.
